text: Futhi sabanika njengefa labo bantu ababethathwa ngokuthi babuthakathaka, izindawo ezingaseMpumalanga emhlabeni nezingaseNtshonalanga kwawona (umhlaba) okuyiwona esawubusisa futhi lagcwaliseka izwi leNkosi yakho elihle kubantwana bakwa-Israyeli ngenxa yokubekezela kwabo futhi sabhubhisa konke lokho ayekwenza uFaro nabantu bakhe nakho konke lokho ababekwakhileyo
